Package curam.core.impl

Interface Summary
Mapper Maps Curam Search Service entities to their counterparts in the staging database and staging DB rows to Curam database Entities.
StreamableMapper An extension to the mapper class to facilitate streaming and check pointing.
 

Class Summary
AdminOptimizeOnlineSearchServices TODO: JavaDoc.
DataBaseIndexPersist Batch Process to persist the index for each search service.
DataBaseSearchExtractor Extracts the relevant Search Service information from the Curam DB and populates the relevant Search Staging DB data structures with this information.
ExtractReadMultiOperationForStreaming A readmulti operation for performing streaming processing of a search service.
SearchController Controls a register of all search services and provides information on each.
SearchServiceConnector This class is used to connect to the search server, whether from the Curam application to perform searches or from the startup build target to initialize the server.
SearchServiceMapperForStreaming Adds batch streaming capability to the generic search mapping class.
StartupSearchServer This class contains methods that set up search server internal state.
